page.title: 03WETHERAL NEWS SERVICES
page.content: There is a {weekly newspaper}called the Cumberland News published in Carlisle which carries local news as well as legal and public notices, advertisements etc. The{local daily paper is the Evening News. Nearly everyone gets one or both of these. { Radio Carlisle}provides a very local service through the day while in the evening many people watch the comercial{Border TV. {Parish Noticeboards}are available for use to advertise local meetings or events. There are{Parish Magazines}published at regular intervals with largely retrospective comment. Some{shops}provide noticeboards for articles for sale. The greatest news service is{gossip.
